EmailTemplate.name: 2018BK-11 MST 67A Transponder Upgrade EXTERNAL.2018BK-11 MST 67A Transponder Upg
EmailTemplate.subject: 2018 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | April 23, 2018
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here is this week's Sales Bulletin:
Dealer Sales Bulletin:
BendixKing is pleased to offer a price discount for the MST 70B ADS-B Out upgrade for business jets equipped with the MST 67A transponder with Dealer Bulletin 2018BK-11 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018BK-11 MST 67A Transponder Upgrade Global ADS-B Out Compliance with MST 70B.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2018 Sales Bulletins is available at myaerospace/parts & repairs/downloads/sales bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: http://www.bendixking.com/company/sales-team <[[http://www.bendixking.com/company/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
